Function reference

All functions

arx_args_list()
ARX forecaster argument constructor
arx_forecaster()
AR forecaster with optional covariates
assign_arg_list()
Assign argument list to inside an environment
create_lags_and_leads()
Create lags and leads of predictors and response
df_mat_mul()
Multiply columns of a data.frame by a matrix
epi_shift()
Shift predictors while maintaining grouping and time_value ordering
get_precision()
Determine the precision of a number
grab_names()
Get the names from a data frame via tidy select
knn_iteraive_ar_args_list()
KNN enhanced iterative AR forecaster argument constructor
knn_iteraive_ar_forecaster()
KNN enhanced iterative AR forecaster with optional covariates
knnarx_args_list()
KNN enhanced ARX forecaster argument constructor
knnarx_forecaster()
KNN enhanced ARX forecaster with optional covariates
smooth_arx_args_list()
